main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.connection.validation

Class ConnectionValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.connection.validation.ConnectionValidator

  • public class ConnectionValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    A Utility class which provides the logic to interrogate a Connection and query a data server to check the validity of the data sent by the connection, and retrieve the relevant information to create a new client
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Method Detail

      • validateConnection

        public static MeetingClient validateConnection(Connection clientConnection,
                                               DataServerConnector dataServer)
                                        throws ValidationFailedException
        Uses the validation server passed in to interrogate the connection to check if it's a valid VRMeeting Client
        Parameters:
        clientConnection - The connection to interrogate
        dataServer - The server to use to query for information regarding the validity of the connection
        Returns:
        The Connection and its related user information as a MeetingClient object
        Throws:
        ValidationFailedException - Thrown if there is an error during validation with the reason why the validation failed
